sentences.english: I get a notion from the look in your eyes, yea.
sentences.chinese: 從你的眼睛裏我能看到你若有所失的影蹤。

sentences.english: So, my family did not spend the balcony of the radiator.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我家陽臺上沒有花的影蹤。

sentences.english: How can I find your shadow in the deeply dark cave?
sentences.chinese: 怎樣才能在這深深的黑洞裏找到你的影蹤？

sentences.english: And as far as they are unpretentious in food you can find them absolutely everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 只要有食物，你就可以發現他們的影蹤。

sentences.english: To find out shames and idle hours in me.
sentences.chinese: 找出我羞愧與荒時的影蹤。

sentences.english: In many places, it was impossible to see land.
sentences.chinese: 在許多地方，幾乎已看不見陸地的影蹤。
